services.name: Data Center Infrastructure Monitoring Service
services.description: This RESTful API enables real-time monitoring and analysis of data center infrastructure metrics, supporting administrators in optimizing resources, managing energy consumption, and ensuring system integrity.

services.name: Cloud Resource Management Service
services.description: This service offers operations teams tools for automated provisioning, scaling, and management of cloud ecosystem resources via an extensive REST API.

services.name: Software License Compliance Service
services.description: Organizations can utilize this API to track software license usage, ensuring compliance with agreements and avoiding potential legal or financial penalties.

services.name: Cybersecurity Threat Intelligence Service
services.description: Security specialists are granted access to a robust set of tools and datasets enabling the identification, tracking, and mitigation of potential threats in their IT landscape.

services.name: IT Asset Lifecycle Management Service
services.description: Assets across organizations can be efficiently managed, with features supporting acquisition, maintenance, auditing, and decommissioning, leveraging a comprehensive API suite.
